name: tlsa
description: Web application for Thai-Lao Student Association

scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd Auth0-App/server && npm install" "cd Auth0-App/client && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "nodemon Auth0-App/server/server.js" "cd Auth0-App/client && npm run start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd  Auth0-App/server && npm install && cd Auth0-App/client && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
